Name: Sammy's Group
description:
Sammy's Group is formed by 14 farmers in Teso District and is being represented by Sammy, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 23 years old, is married and has one child. Sammy has been a farmer for five years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Sammy isnâ€™t new to One Acre Fund; he actually joined the program in 2015 and has since noticed his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has been able to save more money ever since.

This year, Sammy will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have light during the night in order to feel safer.

Using this loan, Sammy's Group will purchase a total of eight solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 8.75 acres.
